column4: Ubuntu 9.10 is a very nice distro, but I have one question, why do all the windows open (maximise)
in ubuntu netbook remix it maximizes all applications except some to fit netbbok screen.
might not work but try sudo apt-get purge maximus. will remove maximus if its installed. try
try getting back to previous theme and see if this helps
yep, was trying to sort this when I install last night
given the changes that have been made with autoremove, ill reboot
im stomped into why this is happen, reading about compiz, there is an option that can max all windows, Windows layouts, if i untick this, it ticks itself.
I think this is the problem, bug in compiz
disable compiz and see if it helps
then go to visual effects and make them none
